alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Cortland; Delaware; Madison; Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 03 at 3:27AM EST until March 04 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 3 to 6 inches and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Onondaga, Madison, Cortland, Chenango, Otsego and Delaware counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM Friday to 1 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snowfall rates of an inch per hour possible Friday evening prior to snow changing to sleet, sleet accumulations around 1 inch in spots.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
